features: ✅【High quality】It's made of high quality water-resistant and rip-resistant nylon.
✅【Unbalance backpack wearing styles】It has great flexibility. You can use it both as chest pack and shoulder bag. Also it can be worn in the front or back of body.

✅【Multiple storage purpose sling bag】Large main compartment with inner open cellphone pouch is perfect for iPad Mini with cover, Kindle, Small notebooks, Large cellphone. 4 front zippered pockets are great for various of small items.
✅【Durable】Good construction and strong and sturdy bag. Shoulder strap is adjustable to meet different requirements for both men and women. Also for plus size people.
✅【Versatile】It's perfect for walking/traveling/biking/hiking/museums/theme parks and everyday using. Also it's a great gift for adult.
✅【Notice】THIS ITEM IS NOT INTENDED FOR USE BY CHILDREN 12 AND UNDER.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Keep your hand free while you are walking, hiking or traveling. ✔ Gifts for women and men. ✔ Durable and sturdy, hands-free, safe, comfortable. ✔ Multiple compartments capable of holding your phone, cash, cards plus a few other essentials, make all your valuables safe and well organized.
Smart & Unique Design ✔ 1*main compartment with inside open pocket & zippered pocket ✔ 2*front pockets ✔ 1*front pocket on the top ✔ 1*back hidden pocket ✔ 1*adjustable padded shoulder strap

STURDY AND WATER RESISTANT MATERIALS This sling chest bag is made of nylon. Top-quality zippers and durable shoulder strap. UNBELIEVABLE ORGANIZED 4 Zippered Compartments with one hidden anti-theft pocket in the bag to secure all your items. HIDDEN ANTI-THEFT POCKET Hidden anti-theft pocket is safe for protecting your valuable items inside when you are travelling or lining up. ADJUSTABLE SHOULDER STRAP The Shoulder Strap is easily adjustable with padded. It feels comfortable whether worn on the front, back, or cross body.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this bag to use when I'm riding my motorcycle. It stays in place on my back when riding around town or at highway speeds without issue. It holds my house keys, phone, wallet, my glock 43, a extra mag and a folding knife all fine with comfort. Still has space for extra. The strap is thick and provides good comfort. The bag itself looks nice and has big zippers with string to help with ease of open and closing. Seems to be good quality and for the price you can't go wrong. Would recommend definitely.

reviews.reviewerName: White Elephant of Westchester's REAL REVIEWS!
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THE BEST OF IT’S KIND! TRULY IDEAL FOR EVERYONE!
reviews.reviewText: CANNOT SAY ENOUGH GREAT THINGS ABOUT THIS BAG!!! Tempted to buy more to stash away because it’s become so ideal and irreplaceable to me!!! And I think it’s IDEAL FOR ALMOST EVERYONE...MEN & MOMS DEFINATELY READ ON... It’s compact, but has plenty of space to fit Etsy you need, with various compartments of different sizes and shapes all over the bag, inside and out) making it incredibly easy to carry and handle and allows you to find anything needed extremely fast. I never had a problem fitting everything I needed…understand you’re not going to be able to pack shopping bags or water bottles into it over the course of the day, but if you want to carry around the essentials and possibly a few extra things along the way, this is your bag. And I was able to clip a water bottle onto hardware with a carabiner with no issue some days. The construction is beautiful. The fabric and hardware is heavy duty. I know it is water resistant because I got caught in heavy thunderstorms and everything inside was dry and the outside wiped dry with just a paper towel instantly.I initially got it to take with me on an 8 day trip to Disney World. I was traveling with a toddler and wanted to be sure I had something compact for my own items so they weren’t mixed up in a diaper bag or stroller. I still have not “changed out“ of this bag since I returned home two weeks ago! It has simplified and streamlined what I carry so much that I’m not sure I will ever go back to carrying all of my extremely expensive designer handbags (much to my husband’s chagrin)!!!If you’re a MOM, you’ll LOVE having your own space again!!! And if you’re OUTDOORSY (which I am as well) you’ll love the simplicity, accessibility and compact size that make carrying it all day, regardless of your activity, a snap. This bag could not be better!ALSO, I think it’s ideal for MEN!!! It can allow them to carry more than they do in their pockets without having to carry a duffle/backpack/briefcase and they don’t look like they’re carrying a “purse”. It’s definately got an athletic, on the go look and feel...AND IS EASY ADJUSTED TO FIT ANY BODY (any height, weight, etc). My 6’5” husband tried it on and it adjusted perfectly for him...he also liked it and kept offering to “carry it for me” if I needed him to! Like any guy, he doesn’t just offer that if he thinks he’ll look ridiculous!!! He thought it was just as easy and convenient as I did... I think he’ll appreciate having his own for our next vacation or just our next day trip.TRULY IDEAL!!! Just can’t praise it enough and it’s RARE I feel the need to rave about anything this much!FYI THIS IS A REAL REVIEW!!! Picked it out, paid full price and used it in real life without being asked!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the bag. It seems to be high quality and the zippers operate smoothly. It has many pockets and the large pocket will hold my tablet along with other things. I have adopted this as a man purse. I need to carry many things for daily use, an EPI pen, urinary incontinence pads, wallet, car FOB, phone, coins, pen light, and when traveling, even more. This provides space for all that. It is easy to carry and secure. I gave it four stars instead of five because I had to invent a way to deal with extra strap of the shoulder strap. I used two Velcro straps to tie up the extra. Also the bag wants to always slide down so I find myself hanging onto the strap to prevent this. A thumb hole would be nice or perhaps rubber on the inside of the strap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bag option
reviews.reviewText: Been wearing sweats cuz have a brace on my knee. This fit my purpose perfectly to carry my wallet, keys and stuff. Comfortable to wear across my chest and doesn't bother my neck, many storage pockets, well made. Very pleased with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice storage bag
reviews.reviewText: I really do like this storage bag. Lots of different storage places in it probably around eight or 10 but very unique made out of good quality material. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for travel.!!!
reviews.reviewText: comfortable, easy to use, has enough space to carry personal documents and identifications.!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The Budge Bag that Could Had Been More
reviews.reviewText: The Nicgid Sling bag offers a very compact and versatile way to free up your pockets during your daily life or when travelling. This review is specifically for the 14.5” by 7.1” version of this bag.PROS: Light weight EDC bag that can carry a variety of small items up to an iPad Mini.CONS: Bad strap management, annoying pull straps, not suited for bulky items.MATERIAL: (4 Stars) The bag is made of water and tear resistant nylon that provides positive protection against normal usage and mild elemental conditions. The material of the bag is sturdy and will hold up to being scuffled, tossed around, or exposed to light rain or snow. Although the zippers will do a decent job keeping the contents within the bag dry, it is not water proof and may not provide adequate protection against torrential down pours or heavy rain.COMFORT: (3.5 Stars) The bag is fairly comfortable to wear as long as bulky items are not involved. If bulky items are being stored, it will cause the bag to bulge and make the bag unwieldy. The straps, although unpadded, do provide a good amount of retention surface for the bag and it does help distribute the weight accordingly. However, depending on your body type and how the bag drapes over your torso, the strap may dig into or rub up against your neck.STRAP MANGEMENT: (2 Stars) One of the biggest issue with the bag is strap management. The bag has no real way to manage the extra strap slack without having to cut off the access material. As a result, the access strap ends up being tangled with your body or getting caught on something. The bag would benefit greatly if the company included some sort of elastic holder or a way to tuck the access strap into the bag itself.FUNCTIONALITY: (3 Stars) Overall, the bag will function as advertised. It is ideal for the minimalist who just want to store a few small every day carry (EDC) items without over-stuffing their pant pockets. The following are some items that can be stored in the bag:• Ideal items: Credit cards, money, passport, paper maps, iPhone, iPods, charging cables, pens/pencils, small notepad, thin power batteries, a travel pack of Wet Wipes, men’s wallet, pocket flashlight, loose coins, flash drives, zippo lighter, and keys.• Hand-sized items: Sun glasses, Leatherman, pocket knife, small bottle of hand sanitizer, snack sized bag of peanuts, a granola or Cliff bar, hand gloves, beanie, hand held selfie sticks, and iPad Mini (with cover) or Kindle.• Not Recommended items: Small water bottles or cans, stand-alone mini cameras, scarves, heavy gloves, T-shirt, concealed carry pistol, or a trauma kit.DESIGN: (3 Stars) The design of the bag is pretty well thought out. It contains multiple exterior pockets, an interior pocket in the main compartment, and a secret pocket at the back of the bag. The external pockets can be assessable by both right and left handed users. However, the sections located in the main compartment and the secret pocket behind the bag are only easily assessable by right hand users only. This bag is not really user friendly for left handed people.Overall, this bag is ideal for everyday light or traveling usages when you only have a few items that are too big for your pockets and too small for a backpack. It’s an ideal pack for minimalists, although its strap management leaves much to be desired.Total Star Rating: 3.1 (15.5 points of a possible 25)

reviews.reviewTitle: Very good quality & lots of different pockets.

reviews.reviewText: Fue regalo para mi sobrino que siempre anda en motocicleta. A mí se me hizo un poco pequeña, pero él está muy contento con esta mochillita. Dice que es de tamaño perfecto.
El producto cumple con lo ofrecido por el vendedor

Llegó mucho más pronto de lo esperado y en perfecta condición. Me encanta el producto, justo lo que buscaba! Cómodo y le cabe todo lo que cargo cuando salgo en bici, que fué la razón por este pedido... Le cabe mi celular grande, cartera, llaves, lentes con todo y estuche, hasta una bombilla de aire para la bici, y todavía tiene otros compartimentos para más cosillas. El color es igual al de la foto. Muy felíz con este pedido.
sacoche très pratique avec beaucoup de poches. Petite et discrète. Convient très bien pour etre utiisé tous les jours. Les fermetures ont l'air costaux, à voir avec le temsp. J e recommande.
